verses.verse: Now <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had been <S%H3381>taken<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H6318>Potiphar,<s%> an <S%H4713>Egyptian<s%> <S%H5631>officer<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> the <S%H8269>captain<s%> of the <S%H2876>bodyguard,<s%> <S%H7069>bought<s%> him from the <S%H3459>Ishmaelites,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> had <S%H3381>taken<s%> him <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> so he <S%H1961>became<s%> a <S%H6743>successful<s%> <S%H376>man.<s%> And he was in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H113>master,<s%> the <S%H4713>Egyptian.<s%>

Now his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with him and [how] the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> caused <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H6213>did<s%> to <S%H6743>prosper<s%> in his <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

So <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>favor<s%> in his <S%H5869>sight,<s%> and <S%H8334>became<s%> his <S%H8334>personal<s%> <S%H8334>servant;<s%> and he <S%H6485>made<s%> him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H3426>owned<s%> he <S%H5414>put<s%> in his <S%H3027>charge.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about that from the <S%H227>time<s%> he <S%H6485>made<s%> him <S%H6485>overseer<s%> in his <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H3426>owned,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1288>blessed<s%> the Egyptian's <S%H1004>house<s%> on <S%H1558>account<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> thus the Lord's <S%H1293>blessing<s%> was upon <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H3426>owned,<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> and in the <S%H7704>field.<s%>

So he <S%H5800>left<s%> <S%H3605>everything<s%> he owned in <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>'s <S%H3027>charge;<s%> and with him [there] he did not <S%H3045>concern<s%> himself with <S%H3972>anything<s%> <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H3899>food<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H398>ate.<s%> Now Joseph was <S%H3303>handsome<s%> in <S%H8389>form<s%> and <S%H4758>appearance.<s%>

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>events<s%> that his master's <S%H802>wife<s%> <S%H5375>looked<s%> <S%H5869><s%> with <S%H5375>desire<s%> at <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and she <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7901>"Lie<s%> with me."

But he <S%H3985>refused<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H113>master<s%>'s <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H2005>"Behold,<s%> with me [here,] my master does not <S%H3045>concern<s%> himself with <S%H4100>anything<s%> in the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and he has <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that he <S%H3426>owns<s%> in my <S%H3027>charge.<s%>

<S%H369>"There<s%> is <S%H369>no<s%> one <S%H1419>greater<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> I, and he has <S%H2820>withheld<s%> <S%H3808>nothing<s%> <S%H3972><s%> from me <S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> you, <S%H834>because<s%> you are his <S%H802>wife.<s%> <S%H349>How<s%> then could I <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H9567>evil,<s%> and <S%H2398>sin<s%> against <S%H430>God<s%>?"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about as she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> after <S%H3117>day,<s%> that he did not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to her to <S%H7901>lie<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> her, [or] be with her.

Now it <S%H1961>happened<s%> <S%H2088>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> that he <S%H935>went<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> his <S%H4399>work,<s%> and <S%H369>none<s%> <S%H376><s%> of the <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H1004>household<s%> was <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H1004>inside.<s%>

And she <S%H8610>caught<s%> him by his <S%H899>garment,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7901>"Lie<s%> with me!" And he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand<s%> and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>
When she <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> in her <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and had <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>outside,<s%>

she <S%H7121>called<s%> to the <S%H376>men<s%> of her <S%H1004>household,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H7200>"See,<s%> he has <S%H935>brought<s%> in a <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> to us to <S%H6711>make<s%> <S%H6711>sport<s%> of us; he <S%H935>came<s%> in to me to <S%H7901>lie<s%> with me, and I <S%H7121>screamed<s%><S%H6963>.<s%> <S%H1419><s%>

"And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when he <S%H8085>heard<s%> that I <S%H7311>raised<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>screamed,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> me and <S%H5127>fled,<s%> and <S%H3318>went<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%>"
So she <S%H5117>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> her <S%H5704>until<s%> his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H1004>home.<s%>

Then she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him with <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> "The <S%H5680>Hebrew<s%> <S%H5650>slave,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> you <S%H935>brought<s%> to us, <S%H935>came<s%> in to me to <S%H6711>make<s%> <S%H6711>sport<s%> of me;

and it <S%H1961>happened<s%> as I <S%H7311>raised<s%> my <S%H6963>voice<s%> and <S%H7121>screamed,<s%> that he <S%H5800>left<s%> his <S%H899>garment<s%> <S%H681>beside<s%> me and <S%H5127>fled<s%> <S%H2351>outside.<s%> "

Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when his <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> the <S%H1697>words<s%> of his <S%H802>wife,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H1697>"This<s%> <S%H428><s%> is <S%H1697>what<s%> your <S%H5650>slave<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> to me," that his <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burned.<s%>

So Joseph's <S%H113>master<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> him and <S%H5414>put<s%> him into the <S%H1004>jail,<s%> <S%H5470><s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>where<s%> the king's <S%H615>prisoners<s%> were <S%H631>confined;<s%> and he was <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H1004>jail.<s%> <S%H5470><s%>

But the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> and <S%H5186>extended<s%> <S%H2617>kindness<s%> to him, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> him <S%H2580>favor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H1004>jailer.<s%> <S%H5470><s%>

And the <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H1004>jailer<s%> <S%H5470><s%> <S%H5414>committed<s%> to Joseph's <S%H3027>charge<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H615>prisoners<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> were in the <S%H1004>jail<s%><S%H5470>;<s%> so that <S%H3605>whatever<s%> <S%H834><s%> was <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> he was <S%H6213>responsible<s%> [for it.]

The <S%H8269>chief<s%> <S%H1004>jailer<s%> <S%H5470><s%> did not <S%H7200>supervise<s%> <S%H3605>anything<s%> <S%H3972><s%> under Joseph's <S%H3027>charge<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> was with him; and <S%H834>whatever<s%> he <S%H6213>did,<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> made to <S%H6743>prosper.<s%>
